entry.title: Introducing Bede Engineering
entry.content:
A long time in the hoping, not so long in the making (thanks to Octopress and Justin Kelly’s Theme), we’re pretty excited to finally be able to show you our new engineering microsite.

We’ve got some great posts lined up: everything from write ups on how we manage our army of servers to our approach to continuous delivery. In the meantime, you can browse some of our open source software using the links on the right.
